themes: lack of opportunities for older visual artists
perceived exclusion of white, heterosexual artists
struggles with poverty among long-time artists
key_phrases: Including older, 'mature', hetero, (and dare I even say the word WHITE?) artists
struggling along in near poverty for decades
watching grants and opportunities being handed out to make up for past sins
the supposed goodies that I never got
barriers_identified: lack of funding opportunities for older, white, heterosexual artists
long-term poverty among certain artist demographics
solutions_proposed: increase opportunities for visual artists from underrepresented (in this context, older, white, heterosexual) groups
